Content:
The upcoming eclipse was touched on a few times in another thread here at the Motorcycle Forum. Rather than jack that one, I figured it might be fun to have a thread dedicated to that particular subject. If the path wasn't so dang far from Big Sky Country, I might be tempted to use it as a road trip excuse, but that one is not going to make my wish list.

National Eclipse .com is a good website on the subject. I include one of their maps here, but there are several really nice ones there.
Check it out if the subject arouses your curiosity.

Also of interest is that people sharing a table of tea and biscuits at the tinfoil hat tea party are saying it will be a trigger day for major international, socio, politico, fasten-your-seatbelts events... giving those of us out of eclipse range something to watch for too.

From the National Eclipse .com map I see that there will be nothing to see in western Montana... unless ...
